document.full_text: in 'the tragical life of cheeseboy,' finegan kruckemeyer's play at the duke on 42nd street, a dickensian storyteller relates the adventures of a boy made of cheese.
document.title: theater review | 'the tragical life of cheeseboy': an orphan's adventures, ripe for the telling
lines_and_colors: in 'the tragical life of cheeseboy,' finegan kruckemeyer's play at the duke on 42nd street, a dickensian storyteller relates the adventures of a boy made of cheese.
